title: Test Coverage Result
description: Ultra-simple test coverage data with raw Xdebug coverage information for AI analysis. Designed for generic PHP script coverage collection with vendor directory exclusion.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for test coverage data

coverage.description: Raw Xdebug code coverage data mapping file paths to line execution status

^(?:/|[A-Za-z]:\\\\).+\\.php$.description: Coverage data for a specific PHP file with line numbers as keys

^[0-9]+$.description: Line execution status: 1 = executed, -1 = executable but not executed, -2 = not executable
